subject: America's Cup
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Less than six months before the next America’s Cup regatta begins in a Spanish port, the top sailors with the only American-backed syndicate got a breathtaking reminder that victory will mean more than merely spraying Champagne and hoisting the silver trophy.
